import React from 'react'; import { Box, Typography, Button, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, Paper, Chip, IconButton } from '@mui/material'; import { Add, Edit, Delete, Refresh } from '@mui/icons-material'; const UserManagementTab = ({ users = [], onAddUser, onDeleteUser, onToggleStatus, getRoleColor, getStatusColor, colorScheme, loading = false }) => { return ( ðŸ‘¥ User Management Name Email Role Status Department Actions {users.map((user) => ( {user.name} {user.email} onToggleStatus(user.id)} clickable /> {user.department} onDeleteUser(user.id)}> ))}
); }; export default UserManagementTab;
